fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Holy: Until you have Killed someone, your hand size is 6.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Crucifix: Pick a target. If they do not win with you, deal 1 HP of Unblockable damage to them at the end of the phase (Uncertain). [2 uses, 3 CD, Unlocks D2]
- Purify: Pick a target. If they do not win with you, prevent them from playing a random card type next phase (Uncertain). [2 uses, 4 CD, Unique] 
- Trinity: Make a card in your hand Upgraded, Reforged, and Satcheled. It cannot be traded. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3]
